questions.question: On the night before the exam, she was seen pouring —- the books.
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তরটি হলো ক: over । ব্যাখ্যা: এখানে সঠিক Phrasal verb-টি হবে "Pore over" (প্রশ্নে 'pouring' দেওয়া আছে, যা মূলত 'poring' হওয়ার কথা ছিল)। 'Pore over' একটি ইংরেজি প্রবাদপ্রতিম শব্দসমষ্টি (Idiom/Phrasal Verb), যার অর্থ হলো কোনো কিছু নিবিষ্টভাবে বা মনোযোগ দিয়ে পড়া (to read or study something very carefully) Pore over: অত্যন্ত মনোযোগ সহকারে পড়া Pour over: সাধারণত কোনো তরল পদার্থ কোনো কিছুর ওপর ঢেলে দেওয়া বোঝায়

questions.question: He was astonished —— her performance.
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তর হবে: ক. at বাক্য: He was astonished at her performance. astonished + at যখন কোনো বিষয়, ঘটনা বা কাজ দেখে অবাক/বিস্মিত হওয়া বোঝানো হয়, তখন at ব্যবহার হয়। Structure: Subject + be verb + astonished + at + noun/phrase

questions.question: The manager agreed —- an increase in staff holidays.
questions.explanation: বাক্য: The manager agreed to an increase in staff holidays. ব্যাখ্যা বাংলায় (Structure সহ): Rule: Verb agree এর পরে সাধারণত to + noun / pronoun / verb-ing ব্যবহৃত হয়। Structure: Subject + agree + to + object

questions.question: The arrival of guests and relatives —— made the house lively again.
questions.explanation: এখানে সঠিক উত্তর হবে: খ. has বাক্য: The arrival of guests and relatives has made the house lively again. বাংলায় ব্যাখ্যা (Structure সহ): Subject: The arrival of guests and relatives এখানে মূল subject হলো arrival (একবচন noun)। তাই verb singular হবে। Verb tense: Passive বাক্যে নয়, active বাক্যে present perfect tense ব্যবহার হয়েছে। Structure: Subject + has/have + past participle (V3) + object এখানে: arrival (singular) → has made

questions.question: Before we left for the airport, we —— our tickets.
questions.explanation: এখানে সঠিক উত্তর হবে: খ. had booked ✅ বাক্য: Before we left for the airport, we had booked our tickets. Before clause → "Before we left for the airport" এখানে verb হলো left (past tense)। তাই মূল বাক্যে এর আগের কাজ বোঝাতে past perfect tense ব্যবহার করতে হবে। Past Perfect Structure: Subject + had + past participle (V3) + object এখানে: we had booked our tickets

questions.question: If he had known the truth, he —— differently
questions.explanation: বাক্য: If he had known the truth, he would have acted differently. বাংলায় ব্যাখ্যা (Conditional Sentence – Type 3): Structure : If + past perfect, subject + would have + past participle এখানে "If he had known the truth" → past perfect tense। তাই result clause হবে: would have + V3 (acted) ।

questions.question: She suggested that he —- more careful next time.
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তর হবে: গ. be ব্যাখ্যা বাক্যটি হলো: She suggested that he —- more careful next time. এখানে suggested একটি verb, যার পরে সাধারণত that-clause আসে। Suggest, recommend, insist, demand ইত্যাদি verb-এর পরে subjunctive mood ব্যবহৃত হয়। Subjunctive mood-এ verb-এর base form ব্যবহার করা হয়, subject যাই হোক না কেন। যেমন: She suggested that he be more careful. তাই এখানে "be" ব্যবহার করতে হবে, অন্য কোনো form (is/was/being) নয়। ✅ সঠিক বাক্য: She suggested that he be more careful next time.

questions.question: If only I —— more time to finish the project!
questions.explanation: এখানে সঠিক উত্তর হবে: খ. had ✅ বাক্য: If only I had more time to finish the project! If only → এটি একটি wish/আকাঙ্ক্ষা প্রকাশ করে, যা বাস্তবে নেই। সাধারণত past tense ব্যবহার হয় বর্তমানের অভাব বা অসম্ভব পরিস্থিতি বোঝাতে। Structure: If only + subject + past tense verb এখানে subject = I verb = had (past tense of have)

questions.question: Had it not been for your help, we —— the deadline.
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তর হবে: ক. would have missed Had it not been for your help, we would have missed the deadline. বাংলায় ব্যাখ্যা (Structure সহ): Conditional Sentence (Type–3): Structure: If + past perfect, subject + would have + past participle এখানে "Had it not been for" = If it had not been for (past perfect)। তাই result clause হবে: would have + V3 ।

questions.question: They have announced the —— for the best employee award this year.
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তরটি হলো খ: nominee । ব্যাখ্যা: বাক্যটির অর্থ হলো: "তারা এই বছরের সেরা কর্মচারী পুরস্কারের জন্য মনোনীতদের (nominees) নাম ঘোষণা করেছে।" এখানে সঠিক শব্দটি বেছে নেওয়ার কারণ নিচে দেওয়া হলো: Nominee (মনোনীত ব্যক্তি): যিনি কোনো পুরস্কার বা পদের জন্য মনোনীত হয়েছেন। সাধারণত পুরস্কারের ক্ষেত্রে মনোনীত ব্যক্তিদের তালিকা বা নাম ঘোষণা করা হয়, তাই এখানে বহুবচন বা একবচন হিসেবে 'nominee' সবচেয়ে উপযুক্ত Nomination (মনোনয়ন): এটি একটি প্রক্রিয়া বা কাজের নাম (the act of nominating)। বাক্যটিতে "পুরস্কারের জন্য মনোনয়ন ঘোষণা করেছে" বলার চেয়ে "মনোনীত ব্যক্তিদের নাম ঘোষণা করেছে" বলা বেশি যুক্তিযুক্ত

questions.question: The meeting was postponed by the committee. (make it active)

options.label: গ
options.text: The committee has postponed the meeting.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The committee is postponing the meeting.

questions.option_c: The committee has postponed the meeting.
questions.option_d: The committee is postponing the meeting.
questions.explanation: Passive Voice বাক্য The meeting was postponed by the committee. Subject (কাজ গ্রহণকারী): The meeting Verb (Passive): was postponed Agent (কাজকারী): by the committee Active Voice Structure Active Voice Formula: Code Subject (কাজকারী) + Verb (সঠিক tense) + Object (কাজ গ্রহণকারী) এখানে: Subject = The committee Verb = postponed (কারণ passive-এ ছিল was postponed → simple past tense) Object = the meeting ➡️ The committee postponed the meeting.

questions.question: Someone must finish this work by tonight. (make it passive)

options.label: ক
options.text: This work must finish by tonight.

options.label: খ
options.text: This work must be finishing by tonight.

options.label: গ
options.text: This work must be finished by tonight.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: This work is finished by tonight.

questions.option_a: This work must finish by tonight.
questions.option_b: This work must be finishing by tonight.
questions.option_c: This work must be finished by tonight.
questions.option_d: This work is finished by tonight.
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তর হবে: গ. This work must be finished by tonight. ✅ Active voice বাক্য: Someone must finish this work by tonight. Passive voice করার নিয়ম: Modal verb (must, should, can, may ইত্যাদি) থাকলে Passive structure হয়: Subject (object in active) + modal verb + be + past participle (V3) + rest এখানে: Active subject = Someone Active object = this work → Passive subject Verb = finish → V3 = finished Modal = must ➡️ Passive form: This work must be finished by tonight.

questions.question: I ought to be helped by him. (make it active)
questions.explanation: এখানে সঠিক উত্তর হবে: ক. He ought to help me ✅ Passive voice বাক্য: I ought to be helped by him. Active voice করার নিয়ম: Passive structure: Code Subject + ought to + be + past participle + by + agent এখানে subject হলো I , verb হলো ought to be helped , agent হলো him । Active structure: Code Subject + ought to + verb (base form) + object এখানে subject হবে He , verb হবে help , object হবে me । ➡️ He ought to help me.

questions.question: They will announce the results tomorrow. (make it passive)

options.label: ক
options.text: The results will be announced tomorrow.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The results have been announced tomorrow.

questions.option_a: The results will be announced tomorrow.
questions.option_d: The results have been announced tomorrow.
questions.explanation: উত্তর হবে: ক. The results will be announced tomorrow. ✅ Active voice বাক্য: They will announce the results tomorrow. Passive voice করার নিয়ম (Modal verb "will" সহ): Subject (object in active) + will + be + past participle (V3) + rest Active subject = They Active object = the results → Passive subject Verb = announce → V3 = announced Modal = will ➡️ Passive form: The results will be announced tomorrow.

questions.question: The boy requested the teacher that he might be allowed to go home. (make it direct)

options.label: ক
options.text: The boy told the teacher, Let him go home."

options.label: খ
options.text: The boy said to the teacher, "Let me go home, Sir."

options.label: গ
options.text: The boy said, “Sir, let me go."

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The boy said to the teacher, "Sir, may I go home."

questions.option_a: The boy told the teacher, Let him go home."
questions.option_b: The boy said to the teacher, "Let me go home, Sir."
questions.option_c: The boy said, “Sir, let me go."
questions.option_d: The boy said to the teacher, "Sir, may I go home."
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তরটি হলো ঘ: The boy said to the teacher, "Sir, may I go home." ব্যাখ্যা ও গঠন (Explanation and Structure): প্রদত্ত বাক্যটি Indirect Speech -এ আছে। এর Direct Speech করার নিয়ম নিচে আলোচনা করা হলো: ১. Reporting Verb: Indirect-এ 'requested' থাকলে Direct-এ সাধারণত 'said to' বসে। শিক্ষক বা বড় কাউকে অনুরোধ করলে সম্মানের খাতিরে উদ্ধৃতি চিহ্নের ভেতর 'Sir' শব্দটি ব্যবহার করা হয়। ২. Might be allowed to: Indirect-এ যখন 'might be allowed to' থাকে, তখন Direct Speech-এ সেটি সাধারণত 'May I' দিয়ে শুরু হওয়া একটি প্রশ্নবোধক বাক্য হয় (অনুমতি চাওয়ার ক্ষেত্রে) [২০২৫ সালের ইংরেজি ব্যাকরণ নিয়ম অনুযায়ী]। ৩. Person Change: Indirect-এর 'he' (the boy) Direct-এ 'I' হয়ে যাবে, কারণ ছেলেটি সরাসরি নিজের কথা বলছে। গঠন বিশ্লেষণ: Indirect: The boy requested the teacher (Reporting verb) + that (Linker) + he might be allowed to go home (Permission structure). Direct: The boy said to the teacher, "Sir, may I go home?" (এখানে 'Sir' দ্বারা 'requested' ভাবটি প্রকাশ পেয়েছে এবং 'may I' দ্বারা অনুমতি চাওয়া হয়েছে)।

questions.question: "Do not open the door until I return", he said to his son. (make it indirect)

options.label: ক
options.text: He told his son do not open the door until he returned.

options.label: খ
options.text: He forbade his son to not open the door until he returned.

options.label: গ
options.text: He said his son not to open the door until he returned.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He advised his son not to open the door until he returned.

questions.option_a: He told his son do not open the door until he returned.
questions.option_b: He forbade his son to not open the door until he returned.
questions.option_c: He said his son not to open the door until he returned.
questions.option_d: He advised his son not to open the door until he returned.
questions.explanation: এখানে সঠিক উত্তর হবে: ঘ. He advised his son not to open the door until he returned. Direct speech: "Do not open the door until I return", he said to his son. Indirect speech করার নিয়ম: Imperative sentence (Do not + verb) → Indirect speech-এ সাধারণত told/asked/advised + object + to/not to + verb হয়। Negative imperative হলে not to ব্যবহার করতে হয়। Pronoun পরিবর্তন: I return → he returned (past tense, কারণ reporting verb "said" past tense)।

questions.question: He said to his friend, Why didn't you call me yesterday?" (make it indirect)

options.label: ক
options.text: He asked his friend why he didn't 'call him yesterday.

options.label: খ
options.text: He asked his friend why hadn't he call him the previous day.

options.label: গ
options.text: He asked his friendwhy he hadn't called him the previous day.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He asked his friend why hadn't he call him the yesterday.

questions.option_a: He asked his friend why he didn't 'call him yesterday.
questions.option_b: He asked his friend why hadn't he call him the previous day.
questions.option_c: He asked his friendwhy he hadn't called him the previous day.
questions.option_d: He asked his friend why hadn't he call him the yesterday.
questions.explanation: এখানে সঠিক উত্তর হবে: গ. He asked his friend why he hadn't called him the previous day. ✅ Direct speech: "He said to his friend, 'Why didn't you call me yesterday?'" Indirect speech করার নিয়ম: Reporting verb "said to" → asked (কারণ প্রশ্ন করা হয়েছে)। Question form → Indirect speech-এ statement form হয় (subject আগে, auxiliary পরে)। "Why didn't you call me" → "why he hadn't called him" Time পরিবর্তন: yesterday → the previous day Pronoun পরিবর্তন: me →

questions.question: Neither the manager nor the employees was ready for the meeting. (identify the incorrect portion)
questions.explanation: এখানে ভুল অংশ হলো: ঘ. was ready ✅ Sentence: Neither the manager nor the employees was ready for the meeting. Neither…nor structure: যখন দুটি subject থাকে, তখন verb সাধারণত nearest subject (যেটি verb-এর কাছাকাছি) অনুযায়ী বসে। এখানে nearest subject হলো the employees (plural)। তাই verb plural হতে হবে → were ready । সংশোধিত বাক্য: Neither the manager nor the employees were ready for the meeting.

questions.question: She insisted to meet the director immediately. (identify the incorrect portion)
questions.explanation: এখানে ভুল অংশ হলো: গ. to meet ✅ Sentence: She insisted to meet the director immediately. Verb insist এর পরে সাধারণত on + noun/gerund (verb+ing) ব্যবহৃত হয়। সঠিক Structure: Subject + insisted + on + verb-ing/noun তাই "to meet" ভুল, এর জায়গায় "on meeting" ব্যবহার করতে হবে। ➡️ Correct sentence: She insisted on meeting the director immediately.

questions.question: Which sentence has correct conditional structure?

options.label: ক
options.text: If you will study, you will succeed.

options.label: খ
options.text: If you study, you will succeed.

options.label: গ
options.text: If you studied, you will succeed.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: If you study, you would succeed.

questions.option_a: If you will study, you will succeed.
questions.option_b: If you study, you will succeed.
questions.option_c: If you studied, you will succeed.
questions.option_d: If you study, you would succeed.
questions.explanation: সঠিক বাক্যটি হলো খ: If you study, you will succeed. ব্যাখ্যা: এটি একটি First Conditional বাক্য। এ ধরণের বাক্যের গঠন বা নিয়ম হলো: If-clause: Present Simple Tense (যেমন: If you study) Main clause: Future Simple Tense (যেমন: you will succeed) অর্থাৎ, যদি বর্তমানের কোনো শর্তের ওপর ভবিষ্যতের ফলাফল নির্ভর করে, তবে প্রথম অংশটি Present Indefinite এবং পরের অংশটি Future Indefinite হয়।

questions.question: City parks are often littered with plastic bottles. Therefore, banning plastic bottles in the city will keep parks clean. Which information will be most useful to evaluate this argument?

options.label: ক
options.text: Whether plastic bottle vendors earn profit.

options.label: খ
options.text: Whether litter in parks mainly consists of plastic bottles.
